snippet: After posting an 8.44 E.R.A. in two losses, R. A. Dickey looked sharp for Toronto, which is relying more than ever on its pitching in the wake of Jose Reyes’s injury.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays defeat Kansas City Royals, 3-2, giving Jays pitcher  and 2012 Cy Young winner R A Dickey his first win after rocky start to season; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: After posting an 8.44 E.R.A. in two losses, R. A. Dickey looked sharp for Toronto, which is relying more than ever on its pitching in the wake of Jose Reyes’s injury.

headline.seo: R. A. Dickey Wins First as Blue Jays Beat Royals
headline.main: Dickey Gets First Victory for Blue Jays; Hudson Helps Braves Win Eighth Straight
headline.print_headline: Dickey Gets First Victory for Blue Jays; Hudson Helps Braves Win Eighth Straight
